version_description:
Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Fixes issues with playing downloaded episodes on iPhone 6+

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @Acast (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @Acast (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @Acast (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Relevant episodes will now automatically be added to an 'Upcoming' queue when playing an episode.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @Acast (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @Acast (Twitter)

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @Acast (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @Acast (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Tapping the current item in the tab bar will now scroll the visible list to the top.
• The app will now indicate if a download has failed by displaying an exclamation mark next to the episode.
• It is now possible to remove episodes in the 'Up Next' list by long-pressing on the episode.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We have introduced a new tab called Me. In there you can find downloaded episodes, followed shows and more.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We have introduced a new tab called Me. In there you can find downloaded episodes, followed shows and more.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Episodes in lists now have a menu button. In there you will find options like Download, Mark as played, Add to Listen Later and much more.
• Helpful sections have been added on the feed that group episodes by release date.
• Lists containing both shows and episodes will now present these in different sections.
• The player will no longer dismiss itself when encountering an error.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• It is now possible to create an account using E-mail or Google, in addition to Facebook.
• The solid progress line on episodes in lists is back by popular demand.
• We've fixed a bug where it would sometimes require two taps on a headset to continue playing an episode.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• You can now listen to your favorite podcasts in your car using Apple CarPlay
• Various bug fixes and improvements

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• The categories page has received a much-welcomed redesign featuring artwork in a grid layout
• Importing podcasts has been made easier thanks to a step-by-step guide
• Various bug fixes and improvements

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• The player queue now has two sections, 'Up Next' and 'Recommended'. Recommendations will come and go depending on context, but episodes chosen to 'Play next' will be added to the persistent 'Up Next' section.
• We've fixed a bug where downloads became silent when re-played at a later time. Affected downloads will now be flagged and can be repaired by performing 'Retry download'.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We've added an on-boarding tutorial for new users to help them get started.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• The show page has been made more spacious and less cluttered by introducing three different tabs: Episodes, Related and About.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• The show can now be reached directly from the player.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don’t hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Playback speed setting now includes more granular options and an 'apply to all episodes' setting.
• Sleep timer options have been updated with a new 'end of episode' option.
• We have added support for password managers.
• We have introduced an Account Settings page where users signed in with email can view and edit their profile. 
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We have added an option to auto-delete downloads when played. This option can be found in the settings page under the 'Me' tab.
• The bug which could crash the app for iOS 10.3.3 devices has been squashed.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Trailers and bonus episodes will now be highlighted in lists.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Managing downloads has been improved with new options to delete several (or all) episodes at once.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We've added support for filtering episodes in shows and on the feed.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Sharing now includes more information about the show or episode.
• Episodes will now be removed in real-time if they're affected by the filter you've chosen.
• We've fixed a bug where Autoplay would not work for downloaded episodes if 'Auto delete played episodes' was enabled.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We've fixed a rare issue which could cause a downloaded episode to be skipped if played.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• The search page has been updated and now features curated shows and episodes, categories, collections and more.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

• Fixes a crash that could occur on certain version of iOS 9.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• It's now possible to seek using the timeline on the lock screen.
• We've added the option to export subscriptions to OPML in the Settings view.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Fixed a crash that could occur in CarPlay when selecting multiple episodes to play.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Audio from turn-by-turn navigation will no longer overlap with the episode that's currently playing.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Hola! Bonjour! Hallo! Hej!
Acast is now available in more languages! The same podcasting experience but catered to the language of your choice. In this release we've also made some changes to make the recommendations a bit smoother, plus some bug fixes that we hope have disappeared for good.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

• You can now decide your own skip intervals with a new option in the settings.
• You can now watch Podcasts that include videos.
• There was a bug that prevented you from removing downloaded episodes. We fixed that one.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• The total duration of the player queue will now be displayed at the bottom of the list.
• Various bug fixes and improvements

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• You can now select which country to show highlights from in the Discover section of the app.
• RSS feeds can now be manually added by pressing the plus button in the Feed or in My Shows.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• The Search page will now have your region available as an option if it was missing before.
• The Recommended queue will now include both newer and older episodes, in order of importance.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Listen Later has been renamed to Favorites
• Various bug fixes and improvements

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• You can now play shows using your voice by asking Siri to "Play [show name] From Acast".
• The app now makes use of Dark Mode (in the unlikely event that anyone notices)!
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We've added an option in Settings to enable Automatic Download of episodes for shows you have enabled Push Notifications for.
• When creating an account we've added 'Sign in with Apple' as an option.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We've added an option in Settings to enable Automatic Download of episodes for shows you have enabled Push Notifications for.
• When creating an account we've added 'Sign in with Apple' as an option.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

We have a new version of Acast for you! This version speaks some more languages, so congrats if you are Norwegian, Dutch or Portuguese! You'll also be able to share our podcast collections, where our content team curates some of the best podcasts out there.

We love it when you reach out to us, so don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)

Thank you for using Acast and all the great feedback! This is what's new in this update:

• We've added an Airplay button in the player to make it more convenient to activate.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

Don't hesitate to contact us at suggest@acast.com or at @acastsupport (Twitter)
